String.Source: I liked you better when you were just hideous.
String.Dest: 我还是觉得你原来很丑的时候更可爱。

String.Source: I'm not scared of you anymore, adventurer! I'm a matriarch! A scion of the Gods!
String.Dest: 我不再畏惧你了，冒险者！我现在是位伟人，是众神之子！

String.Source: I liked you better when you were just hideous.
String.Dest: 我还是觉得你原来很丑的时候更可爱。

String.Source: Take your worthless Dremora and leave this place! I have Spriggans to torture.
String.Dest: 带上你那一无是处的魔人滚出去！还有些树精等着我折磨折磨呢。

String.Source: To each their own.
String.Dest: 对他们自己每一个人。

String.Source: Indeed, mortal. There are some who would call me a fool, but they are the ones who will boil in my cauldron!
String.Dest: 确实，凡人。有些人叫我蠢货，但是他们都会为此付出代价！

String.Source: To each their own.
String.Dest: 对他们自己每一个人。

String.Source: But not yet. First I must learn how to keep this body strong. So take your boon and take your leave. I have goats to sacrifice.
String.Dest: 但还不是时候。首先我必须得学会如何强壮这副身躯。所以带着你的报酬离开吧。我还有山羊要献祭呢。

String.Source: I don't know, you traded your life for what amounts to marginally better magic.
String.Dest: 我不懂，你出卖你的生命就为了学这一点点更好的魔法。

String.Source: You jest! I was a worm, a bottom feeder, and now I am an eagle! I feast on those who are chained to the ground!
String.Dest: 你敢嘲笑我！我曾是只虫子，位于食物链的底端，现在我是雄鹰！我以所有被栓在地面上的可怜虫为食！

String.Source: I don't know, you traded your life for what amounts to marginally better magic.
String.Dest: 我不懂，你出卖你的生命就为了学这一点点更好的魔法。

String.Source: But I don't need to explain myself to you. Take your worthless Dremora and leave this place! I have Spriggans to torture.
String.Dest: 但我用不着对你解释我的事。带上你那个无用的魔族赶紧滚！我还要去折磨树精呢。

String.Source: You're nothing short of majestic, Misha. A sight to behold, and to fear.
String.Dest: 米莎，你如此伟大。超凡脱俗又令人敬畏。

String.Source: Yes, and it's all thanks to you. No more cowering in a corner with the cobwebs.
String.Dest: 是的，我再也不会在布满蛛网的角落里瑟瑟发抖了，这都归功于你。

String.Source: You're nothing short of majestic, Misha. A sight to behold, and to fear.
String.Dest: 米莎，你如此伟大。超凡脱俗又令人敬畏。

String.Source: Now I'm the spider! No, better than that! A bird! One who soars over mortals like a God!
String.Dest: 现在我是蜘蛛！不，比那更好！一只鸟！像凌驾于凡人之上的神！

String.Source: You're nothing short of majestic, Misha. A sight to behold, and to fear.
String.Dest: 米莎，你如此伟大。超凡脱俗又令人敬畏。

String.Source: But not yet. First I must learn how to keep this body strong. So grab your boon and take your leave. I have goats to sacrifice.
String.Dest: 但还没有结束。首先我必须学习怎么保持这副身躯的强壮。带着你的报酬离开吧。我还有山羊要献祭呢。

String.Source: It worked! Look at me, I'm hideous! Hideous, old and incredibly powerful!
String.Dest: 它起作用了！看看我，我如此令人生畏！可怖，古老，无比强大！

String.Source: What will you do now?
String.Dest: 你现在有什么打算？

String.Source: I told you. I'm going to sacrifice goats. And children. Maybe you if you keep bothering me.
String.Dest: 我说过了，我要去献祭山羊。孩子，如果你一直烦我的话，我不介意换个祭品。

String.Source: Can you teach me conjuration magic?
String.Dest: 你能帮我提高召唤系法术吗？

String.Source: Fine. Listen, and learn.
String.Dest: 很好。听着，然后学习。

String.Source: Can you teach me conjuration magic?
String.Dest: 你能帮我提高召唤系法术吗？

String.Source: You already know everything. Be gone.
String.Dest: 你已经什么都知道了，离开吧。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: Leave.
String.Dest: 离开。

String.Source: Why are you still here?
String.Dest: 你怎么还在这？

String.Source: What do you want?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: How is that Dremora working out for you?
String.Dest: 那个魔人是怎么帮你的？

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？
